name: Paul Brown

roles_in_work.title: Arguing the Toss of a Cat

biography:
Paul Brown is an artist and writer who has been specialising in art and technology for 30 years. His computer-generated artwork has been exhibited internationally since 1967, and he has held a variety of academic and artist-in-residence positions in the USA, the UK and Australia.
 full details available at
www.paul-brown.com
